intro: ^! I bet you didn't expect to see me here."

s: ^Hi. Mr. Calindas, I actually love seeing you out and about. How are you?
^Hi. Mr. Calindas, I actually love seeing you. Oh, I think I may have some ideas for you.
^Mr. Calindas, I actually love seeing you out and about. Oh, I have some great news for Brooklyn.

Chat1: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I'm actually waiting for my mother to finish her first aerobics class with Mrs. Lee. So, I'm feeling pretty good. How is the block party coming along?"

s: ^Well, I think it's going really great now. We made some new changes to make the party feel more inclusive.
^It's going really great now. We made some new changes to make the party feel more inclusive. Speaking of which, do you have a moment?

Chat2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Really? Jessica and I were on the phone last night, trying to make a plan for the day. Has there been some changes? Or did you have some ideas for activities..."

s: ^Well, I found out some neat things, and came up with a plan.
^I talked to Lila and Rashad, and they gave me great advice on how best to make the Block Party fun and inclusive.

ReadyToSolve: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Oh? We would enjoy knowing how to prepare for the day. What are some suggestions of activities at the Block Party Brooklyn may enjoy? How can we prepare?"

s: ^Actually, before I commit, let me check my journal again.

GoodSolution: ^ this is a lot of good news. We don't want Brooklyn to feel singled out, so making all of the activities open to all children will make her and us feel good."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "We can sit down and plan how best to support everyone that day, now."

s: ^Awesome! I know it's no unicorn, but I do hope she'll have a great time.
^Brooklyn is a part of our community, and I'm happy you brought this up with me. I do hope she has a great time.

BadSolution: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Ah. I see. Well, at least everything will be well labeled. I don't know how we are going to help her if she feels overstimulated, though."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Wish there was something to do about that..."

s: ^Wait, I think we can do more. Let me try that again.
^You're right, Mr. Calindas. There's more I can think of. I'll get right back to you.

SolvedGoodbye: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I'll tell Brooklyn and Jessica the good news. In the meantime, I'm going to pick up my Mom now."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I'm pretty sure if I leave her any longer she will end up with another volunteering project! I'll see you at the Block Party!"

s: ^I'm looking forward to it. Give everyone my love! Bye!
^I am not surprised Mother Calindas is as busy as you are. Tell everyone hello for me!

TempGoodbye: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I understand. This isn't easy to just come up with. Let me know if you have anything. I'm going to go in and meet Mom. See you soon."

s: ^It really isn't. I just want to make sure everything is right. See you soon!!
